articles.description:
🚨 AIRDROP RUMOUR 🚨
@OndoFinance is bringing treasury and corporate bonds on-chain.
They've deployed a lending platform @FluxDeFi where holders borrow against their bonds.
As a result, rates for lending stables are just below the treasury rates @ 3.75%.
useful for $ONDO? 🎈 https://t.co/UDnjjIHRGK

articles.author: DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊
articles.description:
$BLUR is live.
12% of the token supply has been airdropped to early users and NFT traders.
3 billion tokens in total.
Token is trading at $0.52 ( $1.5b fdv) at the time of this tweet.
Gas is super high right now, you may want to wait before claiming: https://blur.io/airdrop https://twitter.com/defi_airdrops/status/1625376265564991490 https://t.co/LMvDkdvzjy


DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊: $BLUR token launch in around 11 hours 🔥
Care packages collected in 3 airdrop rounds will be opened.
Round 1 - people who traded NFTs in past 6 months
Round 2 - people who listed & traded NFTs on Blur through to November
Round 3 - people who placed bids close to floor prices https://twitter.com/blur_io/status/1625204166682636288
